flavor: "Rankle's pranks are child's play. My games will topple kingdoms."
name: Alela, Artful Provocateur
text:
Flying, deathtouch, lifelink
Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0.
Whenever you cast an artifact or enchantment spell, create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying.

flavor: A faerie's glee at her trove quickly fades to contentment, then to boredom, then to an urge to steal more.
name: All That Glitters
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact and/or enchantment you control.

flavor: A true puppet master has no need for strings.
name: Animating Faerie // Bring to Life

flavor: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.
name: Arcane Signet
text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

name: Arcanist's Owl
text:
Flying
When Arcanist's Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

flavor: "My secret ingredient? Well, I can't tell you that. But here's a hint. It's not love."
name: Bake into a Pie
text: Destroy target creature. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

name: Banish into Fable
text:
When you cast this spell from your hand, copy it if you control an artifact, then copy it if you control an enchantment. You may choose new targets for the copies.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. You create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

flavor: Locthwain knights take pride in being the last ones standing in a fight or on a dance floor.
name: Belle of the Brawl
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever Belle of the Brawl attacks, other Knights you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Chittering Witch
text:
When Chittering Witch enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 black Rat creature tokens equal to the number of opponents you have.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

name: Chulane, Teller of Tales
text:
Vigilance
Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
{3}, {T}: Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.

name: Command Tower
text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

flavor: Castle Vantress has no locks on its doors, but interlopers rarely make it past the foyer.
name: Corridor Monitor
text: When Corridor Monitor enters the battlefield, untap target artifact or creature you control.

flavor:
"After the death of her mother, Cassia found that things that appear fragile can be very strong indeed."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*
name: Crystal Slipper
text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has haste.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

flavor: "The king would die for the realm. I would not hesitate to do the same for him."
name: Embereth Paladin
text:
Haste
Adamant — If at least three red mana was spent to cast this spell, Embereth Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

flavor: "Courage is the only shield I need."
name: Embereth Shieldbreaker // Battle Display

flavor: "We fight with valor in our hearts and fire in our veins!"
name: Embereth Skyblazer
text:
As long as it's your turn, Embereth Skyblazer has flying.
Whenever Embereth Skyblazer attacks, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, creatures you control get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of opponents you have.

flavor: "Lord Rankle will see you now—all he asks is a small token of tribute."
name: Eye Collector
text:
Flying
Whenever Eye Collector deals combat damage to a player, each player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

flavor: The throng flitted from castle to castle, leaving a trail of star-crossed love, damaging rumors, and missing heirlooms in their wake.
name: Faerie Formation
text:
Flying
{3}{U}: Create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying. Draw a card.

flavor: History may be written by the triumphant, but it's often rewritten by the troublesome.
name: Faerie Vandal
text:
Flash
Flying
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Faerie Vandal.

flavor: He endured the white-hot blaze of the Circle and the sweltering heat of the Irencrag, and he emerged victorious.
name: Fireborn Knight
text:
Double strike
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: Fireborn Knight gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

flavor: The middle blade was just right.
name: Flaxen Intruder // Welcome Home

flavor: That gnat was still hovering by the venison, and now both looked delicious.
name: Frogify
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a blue Frog creature with base power and toughness 1/1. (It loses all other card types and creature types.)

name: Garruk, Cursed Huntsman
text:
0: Create two 2/2 black and green Wolf creature tokens with "When this creature dies, put a loyalty counter on each Garruk you control."
−3: Destroy target creature. Draw a card.
−6: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +3/+3 and have trample."

name: Gilded Goose
text:
Flying
When Gilded Goose enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
{1}{G}, {T}: Create a Food token.
{T}, Sacrifice a Food: Add one mana of any color.

name: Gluttonous Troll
text:
Trample
When Gluttonous Troll enters the battlefield, create a number of Food tokens equal to the number of opponents you have. (Food tokens are artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
{1}{G}, Sacrifice another nonland permanent: Gluttonous Troll gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Golden Egg
text:
When Golden Egg enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{1}, {T}: Sacrifice Golden Egg: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Golden Egg: You gain 3 life.

name: Heraldic Banner
text:
As Heraldic Banner enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+0.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

flavor: "I fight for my daughter, who may not set foot on a battlefield for many years. Remember who you fight for."
name: Inspiring Veteran
text: Other Knights you control get +1/+1.

flavor:
"Only the lion knows more stories than I do."
—Chulane, Teller of Tales
name: Keeper of Fables
text: Whenever one or more non-Human creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

flavor:
"By hoof, wing, or paw. For the realm!"
—Syr Gwyn, Hero of Ashvale
name: Knights' Charge
text:
Whenever a Knight you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{6}{W}{B}, Sacrifice Knights' Charge: Return all Knight creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

flavor: Transformed at his own wedding, he promptly ate the banquet, the gifts, and the guests.
name: Korvold, Fae-Cursed King
text:
Flying
Whenever Korvold, Fae-Cursed King enters the battlefield or attacks, sacrifice another permanent.
Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Korvold and draw a card.

flavor: His mind chose solitude, but his heart disagreed.
name: Lovestruck Beast // Heart's Desire
Mace of the Valiant

flavor: Neither hostile nor friendly, pixies flit through the forest seeking the treasures of the wilds.
name: Maraleaf Pixie
text:
Flying
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

name: Midnight Clock
text:
{T}: Add {U}.
{2}{U}: Put an hour counter on Midnight Clock.
At the beginning of each upkeep, put an hour counter on Midnight Clock.
When the twelfth hour counter is put on Midnight Clock, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards. Exile Midnight Clock.

name: Oko, Thief of Crowns
text:
+2: Create a Food token.
+1: Target artifact or creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Elk creature with base power and toughness 3/3.
−5: Exchange control of target artifact or creature you control and target creature an opponent controls with power 3 or less.

name: Piper of the Swarm
text:
Rats you control have menace.
{1}{B}, {T}: Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.
{2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice three Rats: Gain control of target creature.

name: Rankle, Master of Pranks
text:
Flying, haste
Whenever Rankle, Master of Pranks deals combat damage to a player, choose any number —
• Each player discards a card.
• Each player loses 1 life and draws a card.
• Each player sacrifices a creature.

flavor: "Old battlefields make great gardens. So rich from the blood of the fallen."
name: Rosethorn Acolyte // Seasonal Ritual

flavor:
"Virtue is virtue, whatever the heart that nurtures it."
—Malacan, Vantress exile
name: Run Away Together
text: Choose two target creatures controlled by different players. Return those creatures to their owners' hands.

flavor: None of the other villagers dare venture into the wilds, so she feeds the whole hamlet herself.
name: Savvy Hunter
text:
Whenever Savvy Hunter attacks or blocks, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
Sacrifice two Foods: Draw a card.

name: Shambling Suit
text: Shambling Suit's power is equal to the number of artifacts and/or enchantments you control.

flavor: The indigo dragon gladly traded a bit of its hoard for everlasting moonlight.
name: Shimmer Dragon
text:
Flying
As long as you control four or more artifacts, Shimmer Dragon has hexproof.
Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Draw a card.

name: Shinechaser
text:
Flying, vigilance
Shinechaser gets +1/+1 as long as you control an artifact.
Shinechaser gets +1/+1 as long as you control an enchantment.

name: Shining Armor
text:
Flash
When Shining Armor enters the battlefield, attach it to target Knight you control.
Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has vigilance.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

flavor: Tempered by fire and united in virtue, the knights of Ardenvale fight with a single, unbreakable will.
name: Silverflame Ritual
text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
Adamant — If at least three white mana was spent to cast this spell, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

name: Silverwing Squadron
text:
Flying, vigilance
Silverwing Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
Whenever Silverwing Squadron attacks, create a number of 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance equal to the number of opponents you have.

flavor: The purest virtue burns brighter than the sun and hotter than dragonfire.
name: Slaying Fire
text:
Slaying Fire deals 3 damage to any target.
Adamant — If at least three red mana was spent to cast this spell, it deals 4 damage instead.

flavor: "My quest? Why, to marry Ayara. Or die trying."
name: Smitten Swordmaster // Curry Favor

flavor: Many an ancient treasure has been reduced to jagged caltrops by its snapping jaws.
name: Steelbane Hydra
text:
Steelbane Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Steelbane Hydra: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

flavor:
"A traditional lance is fine for the Burning Yard, but in the wilds you need a nastier bite."
—Kenver, Embereth weaponsmith
name: Steelclaw Lance
text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Equip Knight {1} ({1}: Attach to target Knight creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

flavor: Squires throughout the realm aspire to her mix of panache and martial prowess.
name: Syr Gwyn, Hero of Ashenvale
text:
Vigilance, menace
Whenever an equipped creature you control attacks, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Equipment you control have equip Knight {0}.

name: Syr Konrad, the Grim
text:
Whenever another creature dies, or a creature card is put into a graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield, or a creature card leaves your graveyard, Syr Konrad, the Grim deals 1 damage to each opponent.
{1}{B}: Each player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

flavor:
"Hone the kninfe and mourn the least. Three chimes to sound the sweet, grim feast."
—Barrow witch incantation
name: Taste of Death
text: Each player sacrifices three creatures. You create three Food tokens.

name: The Circle of Loyalty
text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Knight you control.
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a legendary spell, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
{3}{W}, {T}: Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

flavor: It will come to the defense of all wild things, from the shivering wren to the towering giant.
name: Thorn Mammoth
text:
Trample
Whenever Thorn Mammoth or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Thorn Mammoth fights up to one target creature you don't control.

name: Thornwood Falls
text:
Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped.
When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

flavor: "Humans are so forgetful. Every page I steal becomes a secret they can't remember."
name: Tome Raider
text:
Flying
When Tome Raider enters the battlefield, draw a card.

name: Tome of Legends
text:
Tome of Legends enters the battlefield with a page counter on it.
Whenever your commander enters the battlefield or attacks, put a page counter on Tome of Legends.
{1}, {T}, Remove a page counter from Tome of Legends: Draw a card.

flavor: No one knows when the tournament began. All they know is that it will never end.
name: Tournament Grounds
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}. Spend this mana only to cast a Knight or Equipment spell.

name: Venerable Knight
text: When Venerable Knight dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target Knight you control.

name: Wind-Scarred Crag
text:
Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped.
When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

name: Wintermoor Commander
text:
Deathtouch
Wintermoor Commander's toughness is equal to the number of Knights you control.
Whenever Wintermoor Commander attacks, another target Knight you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

flavor: She yearned to walk on dry land so she might take her vengeance there.
name: Wishful Merfolk
text:
Defender
{1}{U}: Wishful Merfolk loses defender and becomes a Human until end of turn.

name: Witch's Cottage
text:
({T}: Add {B}.)
Witch's Cottage enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Swamps.
When Witch's Cottage enters the battlefield untapped, you may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

name: Witch's Oven
text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Create a Food token. If the sacrificed creature's toughness was 4 or greater, create two Food tokens instead. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

flavor: It was built by the witch of Lochmere. Most of the wishes it grants are its own.
name: Witching Well
text:
When Witching Well enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
{3}{U}, Sacrifice Witching Well: Draw two cards.

flavor:
"Fear not what's under the bed. The toys are watching."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*
name: Workshop Elders
text:
Artifact creatures you control have flying.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target noncreature artifact you control become a 0/0 artifact creature. If you do, put four +1/+1 counters on it.
